object.name: cliente_pj
object.property: <model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:indexer="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/indexer" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="sigla" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <title>Sigla</title> </field> <field name="representante" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Representante</title> </field> <field name="uf" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>UF</title> <values/> </field> <field name="telefone" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Telefone</title> </field> <field name="email" type="plone.schema.email.Email"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>E-mail</title> </field> </schema> </model>
